mean_cn: adj. 地形的，地形学的，地形测量的
mean_en: connected with the physical features of an area of land, especially the position of its rivers, mountains, etc.
sentence: The special map showed topographical data about the mountains.
sentence_trans: 这张特殊的地图显示了有关这些山脉的地形数据。
word_etyma: topo地形 + graph 写，图 + ical表示“...的” → adj. 地志的；地形学的（等于topographic）
